name: UltrasoundOfTheBreast
title: Ultrasound of the Breast
description: This value set is associated with the "Breast Cancer Screening Recall Rates" measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (OQR) Program. It is also referred to as "OP-39."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with diagnostic imaging studies used to identify breast cancer in men and women.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who underwent a diagnostic ultrasound of the breast.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes that identify breast diagnostic imaging studies performed using ultrasound are captured in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with breast diagnostic imaging are excluded from this value set. Similarly, codes from alternative terminologies other than CPT are excluded from this value set.)

concept.display: Ultrasound, breast, unilateral, real time with image documentation, including axilla when performed; complete
